Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the power law mean wind profile

computeMeanWindSpeed(height, referenceHeight, referenceMeanSpeed, zeroPlanDisplacement, dimensionlessPower) height = the heigh at which the mean wind speed is calculated referenceHeight = a reference height referenceMeanSpeed = the wind speed calulated at the reference height zeroPlanDisplacement = the zero plan displacement dimensionlessPower = a dimensionless power
